Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation

package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation
Provides simplified FHIRPath evaluation infrastructure for single-resource scenarios.

This package contains classes for evaluating FHIRPath expressions against a single FHIR resource type without requiring a DataSource. The evaluator produces Collection objects containing Spark SQL Column expressions that can be applied to datasets.

Key Classes

  • SingleResourceEvaluator - Main evaluator class
  • SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder - Builder for creating evaluator instances
  • CrossResourceStrategy - Defines how cross-resource references are handled

Usage Example


 // Create evaluator for single-resource evaluation
 SingleResourceEvaluator evaluator = SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder
     .create(ResourceType.PATIENT, fhirContext)
     .withCrossResourceStrategy(CrossResourceStrategy.EMPTY)
     .build();

 // Evaluate FHIRPath expression
 FhirPath fhirPath = parser.parse("name.family");
 Collection result = evaluator.evaluate(fhirPath);

 // Get the Column for filtering
 Column filter = result.getColumn().getValue();
See Also:

    Package
    Description
    au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath
     
  • Class
    Description
    CollectionDataset
    A wrapper class that pairs a Spark Dataset with a FHIRPath Collection.
    CrossResourceStrategy
    Defines the strategy for handling cross-resource references during single-resource FHIRPath evaluation.
    DatasetEvaluator
    Evaluator that combines a SingleResourceEvaluator with a Dataset, enabling FHIRPath evaluation that returns CollectionDataset results.
    DatasetEvaluatorBuilder
    Builder for creating DatasetEvaluator instances.
    DefinitionResourceResolver
    A ResourceResolver implementation that works with custom definitions.
    FhirEvaluationContext
    An implementation of EvaluationContext for FHIRPath evaluation.
    FhirResourceResolver
    A ResourceResolver implementation for standard FHIR resources.
    ResourceResolver
    Interface for resolving FHIR resources during single-resource FHIRPath evaluation.
    SingleInstanceEvaluationResult
    Represents the result of evaluating a FHIRPath expression against a single FHIR resource.
    SingleInstanceEvaluationResult.TypedValue
    Represents a single typed value in the evaluation result.
    SingleInstanceEvaluator
    Evaluates FHIRPath expressions against a single encoded FHIR resource and returns materialised typed results.
    SingleResourceEvaluator
    Evaluates FHIRPath expressions against a single FHIR resource type without requiring a DataSource.
    SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder
    Builder for creating SingleResourceEvaluator instances.
